__inputs.name: DS_VCENTERDB
__inputs.label: VcenterDB
__inputs.description: Enter influxdb datasource name for VCenter

__inputs.name: VAR_HOSTSYSTEM
__inputs.label: hostsystem
__inputs.description: Name of the influxdb measurement in which host data is stored (e.g. vsphere_hostsystem)

__inputs.name: VAR_VIRTUALMACHINE
__inputs.label: virtualmachine
__inputs.description: Name of the influxdb measurement in which VM data is stored (e.g. vsphere_virtualmachine)

description: A nice per-Host VM overview of VCenter VMware performance metrics.

targets.query: SELECT "uptime" FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("status") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("vm_name") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("guest_os") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("connection_state") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("ip_address") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("dns_name") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("power_state") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("cpu_usagemhz_average") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("cpu_corecount_total") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("memory_size_total") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("mem_active_average") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("storage_usage") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("eternet_card_total") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("virtual_disk_total") FROM /^$virtualmachine$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "esx" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$vm$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("cpu_usage_average")  / 100 FROM "virtualmachine" WHERE "name" =~ /^$name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("datastore_numberreadaveraged_average") FROM "vsphere" WHERE "name" =~ /$name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"
SELECT mean("datastore_numberwriteaveraged_average") FROM "vsphere" WHERE "name" =~ /$name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"
SELECT mean("datastore_totalwritelatency_average") FROM "vsphere" WHERE "name" =~ /$name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"
SELECT mean("datastore_totalreadlatency_average") FROM /$type$/ WHERE "name" =~ /$name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"
SELECT mean("datastore_read_average")  * 1000 FROM "vsphere" WHERE "name" =~ /$name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"
SELECT mean("datastore_write_average")  * 1000 FROM "vsphere" WHERE "name" =~ /$name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"

list.name: vcenter
list.query: show tag values from vsphere_hostsystem with key = "host"

list.name: host
list.query: show tag values from vsphere_hostsystem with key = "name" where host =~ /$vcenter/

list.name: vm
list.query: show tag values from /$virtualmachine/ with key = "name" where host =~ /$vcenter/ and esx =~  /$host/

title: VCenter VirtualMachine details
